plot: A story about what happens when one seeks revenge on another with the same obsession. It reveals that in the game of revenge there are no victories only tragedies.
title: Hearts of Vengeance
plot_es: A story about what happens when one seeks revenge on another with the same obsession. It reveals that in the game of revenge there are no victories only tragedies.
plot_en: A story about what happens when one seeks revenge on another with the same obsession. It reveals that in the game of revenge there are no victories only tragedies.
